title: test_Upsample_trilinear_scale_3d_cuda intermittently fails
body_html:
We've had the failure both on Linux and Windows, though very intermittently:

  • https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda9-cudnn7-py2-test/1795/console
  • https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1167/console

I'm filing this bug so next time it shows up I can find notes for myself.

body:
We've had the failure both on Linux and Windows, though very intermittently:

- https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-linux-xenial-cuda9-cudnn7-py2-test/1795/console
- https://ci.pytorch.org/jenkins/job/pytorch-builds/job/pytorch-win-ws2016-cuda9-cudnn7-py3-test/1167/console

I'm filing this bug so next time it shows up I can find notes for myself.
